Author: VeeIdee
Title: [ANN][ICO] V-ID - Let's end document fraud with Blockchain Powered Validation
Body: About V-ID  V-ID is a service that detects any unlawful manipulation of any digital file. In order to make files verifiable, they must be validated. V-ID’s validation process involves extracting the fingerprints of files and saving them in the blockchain. If a file is changed with just one byte, pixel, character or anything else, the fingerprint is changed and V-ID will detect it 100%.  https://about.v-id.org/token/    Invest in V-ID  The V-ID Token (VIDT) is the key factor that makes validations possible and is now tradable on the world's largest decentralized Exchange.  https://idex.market/eth/vidt

Author: VeeIdee
Title: [ANN][ICO] V-ID - Let's end document fraud with Blockchain Powered Validation
Body: Important update  In another 48 hours, the V-ID public sale will end. We are humbled by the support of our ever growing community. A big thank you to all V-ID supporters.  Check your KYC!!  1) If you haven't done so, please provide a copy of your passport or ID card for our KYC check. Without KYC we can not transfer the tokens!  2) Please make sure you have entered a valid Ethereum wallet address in your account. This can not be an exchange wallet address, only ERC-20 capable wallet addresses are correct.  Missing KYC or an invalid / missing ETH wallet address will eventually lead to the loss of your tokens!  All participants that already have entered a valid Ethereum wallet address in their account will receive their tokens within 6 business days.  All tokens bought after today will be transferred to the Ethereum wallet address provided within 6 business days.    Exchange listing  The crypto market has not been easy for many of us these last few months. But, is there any light at the end of the tunnel? Absolutely! V-ID has a solid product, with new customers added almost every week. We are constantly identifying new use cases for V-ID's technology, we have expanded our team with new talent, and will continue to innovate and expand the platform.  As stated in the whitepaper, listing is scheduled for Q1 2019. Hopefully the market has recovered by then and V-ID will be in an even stronger position than it is right now, with a much better outlook on a successful outcome for all our investors!  Again, we want to sincerely thank you for your continued support.  The V-ID Team  https://token.v-id.org

Author: VeeIdee
Title: [ANN][ICO] V-ID - Let's end document fraud with Blockchain Powered Validation
Body: V-ID and DigiByte blockchain to end document fraud  Great news! read the article by Rudy CMO, DigiByte:   Rudy Bouwman Chief Marketing Officer & Core Member DigiByte, Co-Founder DigiByte Awareness Team.    Blockchain-powered, on-demand, secure verification of any digital file.  Rotterdam, September 16th, 2018 An unfortunate consequence of our increasingly digital lives is the risk of fraud, manipulation, and tampering of digitized files. This risk is mitigated through the advanced V-ID data validation service and authenticated on the DigiByte blockchain.  The V-ID concept began in the WIDIDI software studio, a UK/NL based company that has been building secure online platforms for sensitive information management since 2008. These days, V-ID is a separate company. V-ID has a minimum viable product (MVP) and is currently in use by several organizations such as, Airbus Defence & Space, WildRadar Fauna Management Platform, fiber network Vitrumnet, JWC Superyachts and the Maritime Cyber Alliance.  Once validated, the documents can freely be copied, distributed and renamed, while still keeping their verified status. Recipients can verify that the contents of the file are exactly the same as the originally published document. V-ID is also compliant with recent GDPR guidelines, as it does not store the actual digital file or require personal data for validation.  Marnix van den Berg, Lead Development at V-ID: “The DigiByte blockchain will empower the V-ID corporate services with great transaction speed at low costs. Combined with the immense spread of the DigiByte network, it is a superior store of publicly accessible and timestamped V-ID data”  According to Rudy Bouwman, Chief Marketing Officer at DigiByte and Co-Founder of the DigiByte Awareness Team: “Enhancing Cyber Security and making the Internet a safer place is a long-term mission of the DigiByte blockchain. We are excited to see the DigiByte foundational protocol being used by companies like V-ID who require fast, safe, and highly decentralized transactions. The ability to authenticate digital files without a third party will not only reduce fraud, but open the door to new opportunities and innovation.”    About DigiByte and The DigiByte Awareness Team (DGBAT)  DigiByte is the fastest, most secure and most decentralized open-source blockchain. The DGBAT is a community driven marketing and education campaign to promote awareness and utilization of the DigiByte blockchain. For more information about DigiByte please visit www.digibyte.io. For additional information about DGBAT, please contact info@dgbat.org or visit www.dgbat.org.  About V-ID  V-ID uses blockchain technology to end all document fraud. The V-ID validation service allows organizations to validate the identity of their documents. Those documents can then be verified on the blockchain.   Read more about V-ID’s validation process here: https://medium.com/@pim_vee/v-ids-file-validation-process-explained-fc592782e14a  Recipients know that the content of the document is unaltered and exactly as originally published. V-ID’s utility token, called VIDT, is the backbone of their business process. VIDT is currently available through their token sale, and will be listed on at least one exchange before Q1 2019.  For additional information about V-ID, please visit: https://token.v-id.org.

Author: VeeIdee
Title: [ANN][ICO] V-ID - Let's end document fraud with Blockchain Powered Validation
Body: First notary office to embrace V-ID’s blockchain-based services    Dutch notary office eKo Notaris starts with the delivery of blockchain based services using V-ID. The first steps were taken in the past year, now the market introduction follows.   “Digitization is also taking place in the notarial profession. Blockchain-based certification of diplomas is a logical step in the provision of services . The possibilities of blockchain technology offerings in combination with the reliability and service are a logical combination.“ according to notary Christian de Kok.   “It is easy to copy or modify digital documents, and there are daily reports of fraud or manipulation of documents. Because it is seen as time-consuming and costly to validate documents, proper validation is hardly done. Verification is also absent for the same reasons. For example, when applying for a position, diplomas can be submitted, but establishing authenticity is a laborious process.“    Therefore, the combination of the blockchain-based V-ID platform and the notary practice is ideal. This makes new forms of services possible, which means that, for example, authentication can also be done at more accessible locations without sacrificing reliability. After all, De Kok has identified this party in person before a he or she validates a document in the blockchain. “This is old-fashioned notarial control in a new way.”  eKo Notaris will start offering V-ID powered services for document validation, validation of documents of identification. They combine those services in 8 packages with his notary-specific offerings, like legal document audits.  “Blockchain technology still is new and has had some start-up issues. V-ID is one of the first blockchain applications that are practically applicable.”  Validating documents with V-ID is easy and cost effective. Also verifying documents is simple and fast: you can check the integrity of the file within 5 seconds with a normal internet browser.   “This is a significant improvement in the current and poorly secured methods with digital signatures, passwords and cumbersome actions in Adobe Acrobat” says De Kok.   Nowadays it is very easy to distribute files on a USB stick or through the network. With V-ID, these documents can be validated in one click. As a result, verification will actually be done much more often in practice than is currently the case. This is a logical step towards further fraud prevention.   With V-ID, documents can be validated without the issuer having a copy or register. This makes it easier to comply with the new GDPR privacy legislation and the legislation surrounding the retention periods for documents.  The V-ID Token Sale is now live!    Why invest in V-ID?  ✔️ Operational platform ✔️ Growing client base ✔️ Buyback and burn policy ✔️ Upcoming altcoin partnerships ✔️ Guaranteed listing through Alterdax.com  Watch the investor promo: https://youtu.be/xG-3CEhVdRs  Join the Presale!  ⚡️Presale started: Yesterday! ⚡️Token Price: 1 VIDT = $0.20 ⚡️First week bonus: 33%  Register now at https://token.v-id.org

Author: saharovvv
Title: [ANN][ICO] V-ID - Let's end document fraud with Blockchain Powered Validation
Body: Hey. I do not understand how you will check the documents. How do you know I gave the original documents or a fake?

Author: VeeIdee
Title: [ANN][ICO] V-ID - Let's end document fraud with Blockchain Powered Validation
Body: Hi Saharovvv, great question indeed..  We check the organisations that publish these documents (KYC). Our software extracts a 'digital fingerprint' of each document using advanced hashing functions developed for the NSA and US military.  We store that fingerprint in the blockchain and compare it to the file you try to verify.  Has to be an exact match. Not a letter or pixel different.  Works for every file up to 2TB  🙂  Thanks for asking and BR,  Marnix V-ID  PS:  Here is a demo video of the verification process: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tGANNanUX3s&list=PLNe32RcMzLQ08DyPgkaMIRhERTVc_JFtr&index=2  and the promo, that explains the the concept: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w32irl45VkU&list=PLNe32RcMzLQ08DyPgkaMIRhERTVc_JFtr&index=1

Author: pacamobradillo
Title: [ANN][ICO] V-ID - Let's end document fraud with Blockchain Powered Validation
Body: some one can tell me, what is product of this project? What will they do? I can not understand and see anything useful in this announcement. An other side, if there are any one interested in this project, let's me know why you are if you never mind!

Author: Sjees
Title: [ANN][ICO] V-ID - Let's end document fraud with Blockchain Powered Validation
Body: Hi pacamobradillo,  We provide a service to notarize any digital file and lock it in the blockchain in a way that anyone can verify when an by whom it was published.  More importantly, we will know exactly if any part of it was changed. In this way V-ID protects files like diploma's and many many other files.  Also, we identify (KYC) every publisher so we can be sure about the issuing organisation.

Author: VeeIdee
Title: [ANN][ICO] V-ID - Let's end document fraud with Blockchain Powered Validation
Body: Welcome newcomers to V-ID, Blockchain Powered Validation.  The V-ID validation service uses blockchain technology to end all document fraud. Our client base, with customers like Airbus Space & Defence, operates in various fields, including education, medical, research and tech.  With funding generated by this token sale, V-ID will transform into a market leader in file fraud protection, just like SSL has become for secure internet connections.  V-ID in 90 seconds  Watch the V-ID promo: https://youtube.com/watch?v=w32irl45VkU  Latest news  ⚡️Whitelist is now Live! ⚡️To get started, please register at https://token.v-id.org  Presale Details  👉🏻Start Date: 15/09/2018 👉🏻End Date: 15/10/2018 👉🏻Token Price: 1 V-ID = $0.20 👉🏻First week bonus: 35% 👉🏻Minimum Contribution: 1000 VIDT  Links  V-ID token sale: https://token.v-id.org Whitepaper: https://token.v-id.org/whitepaper V-ID platform: https://www.v-id.org Twitter: https://twitter.com/v_id_blockchain Medium: https://medium.com/@pim_vee Telegram: https://t.me/vidtoken LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/v-id/ YouTube: https://youtube.com/watch?v=w32irl45VkU CryptoCompare: https://www.cryptocompare.com/coins/vidt/overview V-ID bounty campaign: https://bounty.v-id.org  Group rules  ✔️ Please only write in English in this group ✔️ No bad mouthing, no name calling, act like a gentleman/lady ✔️ If you get a warning, please respect it ✔️ Deliver value to the discussion ✔️ Focus discussions on V-ID  Hi everyone, thanks for looking!  V-ID has developed a powerful platform to detect and prevent document fraud. The V-ID service can be used for PDF diploma's, but also audit trails, security footage, certificates, research results etc. Our very scalable and broadly useful tech makes use of blockchains' strongest mechanisms, and is already used by several clients, including Airbus Defence & Space.  As a starting point to get to know us better, I would like to invite you to watch our 90 sec. introduction video to get an idea of how it works. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w32irl45VkU  There's lots more to tell, which we will do in the coming months through our Medium articles, tweets and in places like this.  You can check out the V-ID verification terminal at https://www.v-id.org  ...and apply for our whitelist at https://token.v-id.org .  Cheers!  Marnix Lead Development V-ID

Author: VeeIdee
Title: [ANN][ICO] V-ID - Let's end document fraud with Blockchain Powered Validation
Body: Dutch college HBODrechtsteden immortalizes diplomas using V-IDs blockchain technology  Sander Fischer, HBO Drechtsteden student and professional footballer at Sparta, is the first graduate to obtain a V-ID blockchain validated diploma.  Document fraud is made impossible with blockchain technology by Dutch company V-ID.  The increasing digitization brings us a lot of benefits, but also risks, including document forgery and identity fraud. V-ID offers a breakthrough solution with which the authenticity of documents can always be determined.  Student Sports Management and Entrepreneurship, and also professional footballer at Sparta, Sander Fischer, is the first graduate whose diploma is recorded in the blockchain. Sander has followed the bachelor’s program especially for top athletes, that is offered in cooperation with the VVCS-Academy.    “Super fun! Blockchain is the future and this is how I learn about interesting new applications, plus I am the first graduate bachelor student in the Netherlands whose diploma is recorded in the blockchain.” Says Sander Fischer.  Arjan Ebbinge (VVCS), Han van Gorkom (HBO Drechtsteden), Sander Fischer (Sparta) en Pim Voets (V-ID)  HBO Drechtsteden issues certificates and diplomas for successful students and course participants. By storing the digital fingerprint of these documents in the blockchain, diploma fraud is prevented. The diploma can always be checked for authenticity.  Read more on Medium:  https://medium.com/@pim_vee/v-ids-file-validation-process-explained-fc592782e14a
